speaker: C
text: I think I can probably guess that you may be in agreement with me on the cigarette lighter as well. I think they should take that. Even without fluid, it can provide a spark.

speaker: R
text: Yes, and that coupled with the butter and the pistol. I did wonder would there perhaps be flint about and they could maybe have a go with rubbing sticks together or trying to bash two rocks together, but I think From the description, these people are dressed for a business meeting and are not really prepared for such eventualities.
